title: The Tournament of Tiers
goal: Artie must fight through the brackets without taking a single point of damage.
stakes_shift: Public exposure turns Artie from a hidden glitch into a populist hero and a high-priority System threat.

bridge.from_prev: Artie is the underdog in the arena.
bridge.to_next: Artie reaches the finals against Vane.

sections.title: The Round of 32
sections.intent: Showcase Artie's growing tactical creativity and the System's attempt to nerf him mid-match.

scenes.summary: Artie faces a 'Tank' and wins instantly by critting the Tank's belt buckle, causing a disqualification.
scenes.outcome: The crowd goes wild; Artie is the 'One-Hit Wonder'.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: The System tries to nerf Artie mid-match by introducing 'Wind Resistance' to the arena.
scenes.outcome: Artie has to learn to time his punches with the wind gusts.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie wins the next round by critting the air so hard it creates a vacuum, sucking his opponent out of the ring.
scenes.outcome: Artie moves to the quarter-finals after vacuum-critting his opponent out of the ring.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie moves to the quarter-finals after vacuum-critting his opponent out of the ring.

sections.title: The Mirror Match
sections.intent: Artie faces a high-evasion rogue, forcing him to use unconventional environmental exploits.

scenes.summary: Artie's opponent is a 'Dodge-Build' rogue who also has low HP, leading to a stalemate.
scenes.outcome: The fight becomes a high-speed game of tag.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Neither can land a hit for ten minutes, and the crowd begins to boo the lack of action.
scenes.outcome: Artie realizes he needs to change his strategy.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie uses his 'Participation Trophy' to lure a swarm of arena-flies, distracting the rogue for a finishing crit.
scenes.outcome: Artie wins, but the 'Trophy' is now glowing with dark energy.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: The System issues a 'Warning' to Artie for 'Unsportsmanlike Exploitation' following the fly tactic.
scenes.outcome: Artie wins but receives a System warning for 'Unsportsmanlike Exploitation'.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie wins but receives a System warning for 'Unsportsmanlike Exploitation'.

sections.title: The Semi-Finals
sections.intent: Artie overcomes a mechanical handicap ('Inverted Controls') to reach the finals.

scenes.summary: Artie's debuff for the semi-finals is 'Inverted Controls,' making every movement erratic.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie's opponent is a Mage who uses AOE spells, forcing Artie to 'moonwalk' through the fireballs.
scenes.outcome: Artie manages to reach the Mage and lands a crit that turns the Mage's staff into a rubber chicken.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: The Mage surrenders out of pure embarrassment, sending Artie to the finals.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Vane watches from the wings, holding a 'System Override' scroll he bought from the black market to rig the final match.
scenes.outcome: Vane prepares to use a 'System Override' scroll to rig the final fight.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Vane prepares to use a 'System Override' scroll to rig the final fight.
